Leaf curvature

leaf_curvature.Rd

Compute the leaf curvature as VPalm do

leaf_curvature(position, angC, angA, coefCurv, Length)

Arguments

position

The positions along the rachis relative to the tip (A point)
angC

The angle of the leaf at C point
angA

The angle of the leaf at A point (tip)
coefCurv

Curvature coefficient
Length

The total rachis length

Value

The leaf curvature as a data.frame of the X and Y coordinates of the input relative positions

Examples

# NOT RUN {
library(Vpalmr)
leaf_curvature(position= c(0,0.43,0.69,1),
               angC= c(27.14,27.14,27.14,27.14),
               angA= c(66.59,66.59,66.59,66.59),
               coefCurv= 3.58,
               Lenght= c(320.11,320.11,320.11,320.11))
# }
